timeline.bodyText: It would be better if you could pass along this data, setting/retrieving a value in sharedprefences is a bit surprising
timeline.author: macgills

replies.bodyText:
@macgills Can you please elaborate:-)
showSuccessToast method in WikiEditService class uses sharedpreference to retrieve the value for title. If not set it uses default, that's why i set the value when item is uploaded.
replies.author: 318anushka

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, whoever did that just shouldn't have. We shouldn't use shared preferences to communicate data unless it is actually a preference of the app/user.
Add wikiItemName as a parameter to showSuccessToast() and keep adding it up the chain of methods until you have access to it.
I still have no idea what half these fields are or aren't so I can't comment if place.name() is a wikiItemName
replies.author: macgills

timeline.bodyText: If you add a field to contribution you have to add it to the parcelable methods as well or you break the contract
timeline.author: macgills

replies.bodyText: I have a doubt. why isn't wikiDataEntityId added to parcelable method
replies.author: 318anushka
macgills

replies.bodyText:
why isn't wikiDataEntityId added to parcelable method

Probably someone messed up because it is difficult to see from a small change that this class is parcelable. You would have to know it off the top of your head
replies.author: macgills

timeline.bodyText: no need to assign this to a variable
timeline.author: macgills

timeline.bodyText:
I don't think you need to null check this, or at least not here.
createClaimWithLogging already null checks the p18 and wikidatEntityId, all fields that are only present when the contribution has an associated place ie was uploaded from Nearby or we detected it was Nearby Place from the associated image data.
timeline.author: macgills

replies.bodyText: It would be much nicer if we expressed Contribution & ContributionWithAssociatedWikidataItem as types (preferably better named ones too) instead of the current scenario. Far out of scope of this ticket, just me musing
replies.author: macgills

replies.bodyText:
Sorry, Test cases 😅
have to edit test file to pass values.
replies.author: 318anushka
